test.name: UnconditionalForwarding.TC.008
test.description: Validate the phone number in Forwarding Configuration SMS is not permitted if it is in the global black list Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- 1. Using Subscriber MMS Extra web portal. 2. Go to subscriber "UnconditionalForwarding" add page 3. Try to add phone number listed in global black list through Forwarding Configuration SMS 3. Put MSISDN=987654321 in Subscriber A forwardingMsisdn. 4. Sender sends message to Subscriber A. ---------------------------------------------------------------

function.name: executeRemoteXMSCommand
function.parameter: run command querier -y 1 -x 0 -o MMSX -p F.CEE.DB-ACCESS -m com.mobilgw.intf.uds.mor.MmsxService.updateServiceForward subscriberId=5001 serviceEnabled=true serviceConditional=true forwardingMsisdn="987654321" forwardingAll=true subjectPrefix="Fwd"

function.name: setHeader
function.parameter: This message sent by global black list subscriber

function.name: executeRemoteXMSCommand
function.parameter: run command querier -y 1 -x 0 -o MMSX -p F.CEE.DB-ACCESS -m com.mobilgw.intf.uds.mor.MmsxService.updateServiceForward subscriberId=5001 serviceEnabled=true serviceConditional=true forwardingMsisdn="0891115101" forwardingAll=true subjectPrefix="Fwd"
